title: Introduction to Potato Production in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the approximate annual potato production in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT one of the main potato production areas in Timor-Leste?
What is the average potato yield in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a challenge for potato production in Timor-Leste?
choices: Lack of pest and disease pressure
Limited access to quality seed potatoes
questions.answer: Limited access to quality seed potatoes

questions.question: What is a characteristic of heat-tolerant potato varieties?
choices: Tolerance to high day temperatures (up to 35°C)
Inability to tuberize under short day conditions
questions.answer: Tolerance to high day temperatures (up to 35°C)

questions.question: Which of the following is a local potato variety in Timor-Leste?
What is the optimal soil pH range for potato cultivation?
What is the recommended plowing depth for potato soil preparation?
What is the optimal daytime temperature range for potato growth?
At what altitude range is potato cultivation most suitable in Timor-Leste?
How much water do potatoes typically require during the growing season?
Which of the following is NOT a critical period for water requirement in potato growth?
What is the recommended nitrogen (N) application rate for potatoes in Timor-Leste?
What is the purpose of hilling in potato cultivation?
choices: To protect developing tubers from sunlight
questions.answer: To protect developing tubers from sunlight

questions.question: Which potato variety is known for its good processing qualities?
What is the typical maturity period for heat-tolerant potato varieties in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT a common irrigation method for potatoes in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary economic importance of potato production in Timor-Leste?
Which nutrient deficiency in potatoes can cause purple discoloration of leaves?
What is the recommended timing for fertilizer application in potato cultivation?
choices: Basal dose at planting and top dressing at hilling
questions.answer: Basal dose at planting and top dressing at hilling

questions.question: Which of the following soil types is preferred for potato cultivation?
What is the potential role of potato production in Timor-Leste's agricultural sector?
choices: Replacing rice as the staple food

questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of the 'Desiree' potato variety?
What is the main purpose of incorporating organic matter into the soil before planting potatoes?
choices: To improve soil structure and fertility
questions.answer: To improve soil structure and fertility

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common pest or disease problem for potatoes in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary reason for growing potatoes at higher altitudes in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a potential value-added product from potatoes in Timor-Leste?
What is the recommended storage temperature for seed potatoes?
Which of the following practices can help mitigate the effects of climate change on potato production in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary function of potassium in potato plants?
choices: Improving tuber quality and storage life
questions.answer: Improving tuber quality and storage life
